chapter.title: Implemented Standards
chapter.para: The primary standard implemented by CKS is RFC2440, the openPGP standard.

chapter.title: Officially Participating in the Project
chapter.para: To officially participate in the project, you should set up an account on SourceForge. The CVS tree for CKS is hosted there. Initially, email patches to the project manger, currently VAB. After you have demonstrated coding ability, an understanding of the long term goals of the project, and demonstrated a dedicated level of effort to the project, you can ask for write access to the CVS tree.
